content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 10.5, 10.5), boiler (position -6.0, 24.5) and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a chest at position (-16.5, -49.5)

### Iron plate smelter at position (40.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position 40.0, -82.0), furnace (position 45.0, -83.0), furnace (position 42.0, -81.0), furnace (position 45.0, -80.0), furnace (position 40.0, -79.0) and their respective chests

### Lab at position (0.5, 0.5)
Consists of lab (position 0.5, 0.5), burner inserter (position 3.5, 0.5), chest (position 2.5, 0.5), small electric pole (position 2.5, 1.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burners but being out of fuel
- Ensure you have enough fuel in your burners before using them
### Errors when using boilers but being out of fuel
- Ensure you have enough fuel in your boilers before using them
### Errors when using offshore pumps without proper fluid connections
- Ensure offshore pumps are properly connected to fluid systems
### Errors when using steam engines without proper fluid connections
- Ensure steam engines are properly connected to fluid systems
### Errors when using furnaces without ingredients to smelt
- Ensure furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt before using them
### Errors when using labs without power
- Ensure labs are properly connected to the electricity grid and have enough power to function
